description:
Flivr is an endless river of all of the best of Flickr's pictures. Explore all the beauty and fascination of each day's best images from the world's largest photography site in a never-ending mosaic.

Flickr Explore provides the top 500 photos each day and this app will allow you to see all of the images that ever made it into Flickr Explore through infinite scrolling. You can also see each photo in full size, flick through the images in full screen mode and visit a photo's Flickr page directly from within the app. You can also make a picture you particularly like to be your TouchPad's wallpaper.

There is also new support for the Touchpad's exhibition mode, where a live stream from Flickr's Panda feature is displays so you can get a slide show of photos that are interesting in that very moment.
versionNote: Should be much faster now, excludes videos and has first support for exhibition mode (dock mode). Exhibition mode is still beta though, so please report any problems you might encounter with it.
